name: pixsee
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
pixsee is a smart baby camera that lets you watch over your baby from anywhere. Use the pixsee skill to manage your pixsee devices. Simply enable the pixsee Skill in the Alexa App and link your Alexa and pixsee accounts to get started.

To view activity from your pixsee camera, say:
“Alexa, show camera.”

To stop your pixsee feed, say:
“Alexa, back to home.”
“Alexa, go home.”
“Alexa, stop.”
